platform.name: Win32
platform.description: - A new eMusicBook included: Music Reading level 1 - Replaced MDI user interface by a notebook tabbed interface. - Dutch language translation now included - Improvements in the Score internal model to support more features: graphical objects (arrows, lines, etc.); metronome marks; global, inheritable options in all score elements. - Improvements in LDP language to support the new features.
